smartlink_detected.description:
The {device_name} ({serial_number}) is using SmartLink (hub) connectivity, which is not supported by Airthings BLE.

If you want to keep using SmartLink:
1. Set up the Airthings integration (cloud) and sign in to your Airthings account.
2. Disable the Airthings BLE entities for this device.

If you want to use Bluetooth instead:
1. Open the Airthings app.
2. Go to Settings > Devices.
3. Select your {device_name}.
4. Select `Reset connectivity` to switch to Bluetooth.

After switching to Bluetooth, this issue will be automatically resolved within about 5 minutes for most devices, or up to 30 minutes for Corentium Home 2.
smartlink_detected.title: Unsupported connectivity mode
